name: io.github.Couchbase-Ecosystem/mcp-server-couchbase
description: Couchbase Model Context Protocol Server to interact with Couchbase clusters

environmentVariables.name: CB_CONNECTION_STRING
environmentVariables.description: Couchbase connection string. Required for connecting to the cluster.

environmentVariables.name: CB_USERNAME
environmentVariables.description: Couchbase database username. Required for basic authentication.

environmentVariables.name: CB_PASSWORD
environmentVariables.description: Couchbase database password. Required for basic authentication.

environmentVariables.name: CB_CA_CERT_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Couchbase CA certificate path. Required for TLS authentication in non Capella clusters.

environmentVariables.name: CB_CLIENT_CERT_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Couchbase client certificate path. Required for mTLS authentication.

environmentVariables.name: CB_CLIENT_KEY_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Couchbase client key path. Required for mTLS authentication.

environmentVariables.name: CB_MCP_READ_ONLY_QUERY_MODE
environmentVariables.description: Couchbase read only query mode. Set to true to allow only read-only queries. Set to false to allow data modification queries.

environmentVariables.name: CB_MCP_TRANSPORT
environmentVariables.description: Transport mode for the server (stdio, http or sse). Default is stdio

environmentVariables.name: CB_MCP_HOST
environmentVariables.description: Host to run the MCP server on (default: 127.0.0.1). Used only for HTTP and SSE transport modes.

environmentVariables.name: CB_MCP_PORT
environmentVariables.description: Port to run the MCP server on (default: 8000). Used only for HTTP and SSE transport modes.

packageArguments.description: Couchbase connection string. Required for connecting to the cluster.

packageArguments.description: Couchbase database username. Required for basic authentication.

packageArguments.name: --client-cert-path
packageArguments.description: Couchbase client certificate path. Required for mTLS authentication.

packageArguments.name: --client-key-path
packageArguments.description: Couchbase client key path. Required for mTLS authentication.

packageArguments.description: Couchbase read only query mode. Set to true to allow only read-only queries. Set to false to allow data modification queries.
